SELECT
resourceShop.itemId AS rs_itemId, resourceShop.itemName, resourceShop.itemPrice, resourceShop.itemWriter, resourceShop.resourceDate, resourceShop.resourceSubCategoryId AS rs_resourceSubCategoryId, resourceShop.rankid AS rs_rankid,
resourceFile.resourceFileId, resourceFile.resourceFileName, resourceFile.itemId AS rf_itemId,
ranking.rankId, ranking.totalRank, ranking.dailyRank, ranking.weeklyRank, ranking.monthlyRank,
counting.countingId, counting.totalcount, counting.dailycount, counting.weeklycount, counting.monthlycount, counting.itemId AS ct_itemId
FROM ResourceShop resourceShop LEFT JOIN ResourceFile resourceFile ON resourceFile.itemId = resourceShop.itemId LEFT JOIN Ranking ranking ON resourceShop.rankid = ranking.rankid LEFT JOIN OrdersDetails ordersDetails ON ordersDetails.itemId = resourceShop.itemId LEFT JOIN Counting counting ON counting.itemId = resourceShop.itemId WHERE resourceShop.itemId=#{itemId} ORDER BY resourceShop.itemId, resourceFile.resourceFileId

SELECT
resourceCategory.resourceCategoryId AS rc_resourceCategoryId, resourceCategory.resourceCategoryName,
resourceSubCategory.resourceSubCategoryId AS rsc_resourceSubCategoryId, resourceSubCategory.resourceSubCategoryName, resourceSubCategory.resourceCategoryId AS rsc_resourceCategoryId,
resourceShop.itemId AS rs_itemId, resourceShop.itemName, resourceShop.itemPrice, resourceShop.itemWriter, resourceShop.resourceDate, resourceShop.resourceSubCategoryId AS rs_resourceSubCategoryId, resourceShop.rankid AS rs_rankid,
resourceFile.resourceFileId, resourceFile.resourceFileName, resourceFile.itemId AS rf_itemId,
ranking.rankId, ranking.totalRank, ranking.dailyRank, ranking.weeklyRank, ranking.monthlyRank,
counting.countingId, counting.totalcount, counting.dailycount, counting.weeklycount, counting.monthlycount, counting.itemId AS ct_itemId
FROM ResourceCategory resourceCategory LEFT JOIN ResourceSubCategory resourceSubCategory ON resourceSubCategory.resourceCategoryId = resourceCategory.resourceCategoryId LEFT JOIN ResourceShop resourceShop ON resourceShop.resourceSubCategoryId = resourceSubCategory.resourceSubCategoryId LEFT JOIN ResourceFile resourceFile ON resourceFile.itemId = resourceShop.itemId LEFT JOIN Ranking ranking ON resourceShop.rankid = ranking.rankid LEFT JOIN Counting counting ON counting.itemId = resourceShop.itemId ORDER BY resourceCategory.resourceCategoryId, resourceSubCategory.resourceSubCategoryId, resourceShop.itemId, resourceFile.resourceFileId

SELECT
resourceCategory.resourceCategoryId AS rc_resourceCategoryId, resourceCategory.resourceCategoryName,
resourceSubCategory.resourceSubCategoryId AS rsc_resourceSubCategoryId, resourceSubCategory.resourceSubCategoryName, resourceSubCategory.resourceCategoryId AS rsc_resourceCategoryId,
resourceShop.itemId AS rs_itemId, resourceShop.itemName, resourceShop.itemPrice, resourceShop.itemWriter, resourceShop.resourceDate, resourceShop.resourceSubCategoryId AS rs_resourceSubCategoryId, resourceShop.rankid AS rs_rankid, resourceShop.userId,
resourceFile.resourceFileId, resourceFile.resourceFileName, resourceFile.itemId AS rf_itemId,
ranking.rankId, ranking.totalRank, ranking.dailyRank, ranking.weeklyRank, ranking.monthlyRank,
counting.countingId, counting.totalcount, counting.dailycount, counting.weeklycount, counting.monthlycount, counting.itemId AS ct_itemId
FROM ResourceCategory resourceCategory LEFT JOIN ResourceSubCategory resourceSubCategory ON resourceSubCategory.resourceCategoryId = resourceCategory.resourceCategoryId LEFT JOIN ResourceShop resourceShop ON resourceShop.resourceSubCategoryId = resourceSubCategory.resourceSubCategoryId LEFT JOIN ResourceFile resourceFile ON resourceFile.itemId = resourceShop.itemId LEFT JOIN Ranking ranking ON resourceShop.rankid = ranking.rankid LEFT JOIN Counting counting ON counting.itemId = resourceShop.itemId WHERE resourceShop.userId = #{userId} ORDER BY resourceCategory.resourceCategoryId, resourceSubCategory.resourceSubCategoryId, resourceShop.itemId, resourceFile.resourceFileId
